text: I guess its just .html files now

A client of mine is having an issue where their email preferences page isn't reacting to clicks on their various lists. The "Unsubscribe from all…" checkbox at the bottom works, but none of the ones above it. The weird thing is that it was working perfectly fine before and I can't see that any users have made any edits.

Anyone seen this before?
Hey there — A few months behind on this one… :headstone:
Im not noticing anything peculiar here. Seems like the `set_response_code(404)` directs me to the 404 system page that I have configured in site settings. Are y’all still seeing issues?
I made a new template, so when i was trying to create new page using this template i couldnt not see content editable fields, why? can anyone please help
